Interface iHTTPOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
HTTPTools
public interface iHTTPOperations
Interface with methods to implement HTTP-operations to fetch data from movie data -related services.
Author:
janii

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    makeGenericHttpRequest(String url)
    Handles TMDB-HTTP requests and responses asynchronously.
    String
    makeTMOTNHttpRequest(String url)
    Handles HTTP requests and responses asynchronously.

  • Method Details

    • makeGenericHttpRequest

      String makeGenericHttpRequest(String url) throws IOException, InterruptedException, IllegalStateException
      Handles TMDB-HTTP requests and responses asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL string for the HTTP request.
      Returns:
      SimpleHttpResponse
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.
      IllegalStateException - If the operation failed at the server.

    • makeTMOTNHttpRequest

      String makeTMOTNHttpRequest(String url) throws IOException, InterruptedException, IllegalStateException
      Handles HTTP requests and responses asynchronously. Only works with The Movie of the Night due to the mandatory headers.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL string for the HTTP request.
      Returns:
      SimpleHttpResponse
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.
      IllegalStateException - If the operation failed at the server.
